summary: Completed comprehensive testing of weather app with Weather Underground integration. All backend APIs working correctly, frontend dashboard fully functional with real-time data display, charts, and Excel export.

design_issues.issue: Console warnings about chart dimensions (-1 width/height) during initial render
design_issues.impact: Charts still render correctly, only console warnings

passed_tests: GET /api/ - Root endpoint returns station info
GET /api/weather/history - Historical data with date range
GET /api/weather/export/excel - Excel file generation and download
Error handling for invalid date formats
Frontend dashboard loading with real-time data
Current conditions display (temperature, humidity, wind, pressure, etc.)
Excel export button and file download
Chart tabs navigation (Temperature, Humidity, Wind, Pressure, Precipitation)
Weather Underground API integration with real data

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all features working, minor chart console warnings)
